meanings.sent1: The designer handbag was pricy but worth it.
meanings.sent2: The new car was too pricy for my budget.
meanings.sent3: I couldn't believe how pricy the tiny cupcake was!
meanings.sent4: The hotel room with an ocean view was as pricy as a diamond.
meanings.sent5: The pricy necklace sparkled in the sunlight, catching everyone's eye.

meanings.sent1: The repair work on the old house was pricy but necessary.
meanings.sent2: Eating out every day can be pricy on a tight budget.
meanings.sent3: I learned the hard way that forgetting my lunch at home can be pricy.
meanings.sent4: The mistake turned out to be more pricy than I had anticipated.
meanings.sent5: The antique vase was pricy, but it added elegance to the room.
